situation.name: Situation
situation.description: The nature of what you face

hopes_fears.name: Hopes/Fears
hopes_fears.description: What you hope for or fear

upright.todays_guidance: Today invites a leap of faith. Approach whatever arises with beginner's mind—fresh eyes, open heart. Don't overthink; trust the impulse toward something new. The day favors starting over planning.
upright.past: You already took this leap. Something began with trust rather than certainty—that choice shaped where you now stand. The seeds of your present were planted when you stepped into the unknown.
upright.present: You stand at a threshold now. The edge is exactly where you're meant to be. This moment asks for trust in the question, not answers. You carry everything you need.
upright.future: A new beginning approaches. The path ahead invites fresh starts and open-hearted ventures. What's coming requires trust in the unknown. Prepare to leap.
upright.situation: The situation calls for beginner's mind. Fresh perspective matters more than experience here. What looks like naivety may be exactly the openness required.
upright.action: Take the leap. Act with trust rather than certainty. Overthinking will paralyze—move before you're ready. The action required is beginning, not perfecting.
upright.outcome: This leads to new beginnings. Whatever happens, a fresh chapter opens. The outcome is a threshold, not a conclusion. One journey ends as another starts.
upright.challenge: The leap itself blocks you. Fear of the unknown, or fear of appearing foolish, creates the obstacle. Beginner's vulnerability is what you're avoiding.
upright.above: Your highest possibility here is pure new beginning. The best outcome involves stepping into the unknown with trust. Aim for the leap, not the landing.
upright.below: Beneath this situation lies a deep yearning to begin again. Unconsciously, you want to wipe the slate clean and start fresh. This hidden desire shapes everything above it.
upright.advice: Be the Fool. Trust more than you plan. Step before you're ready. The guidance here is to embrace not-knowing as a gift rather than a problem.
upright.external: Someone or something in your environment embodies this energy—a catalyst for new beginnings, an invitation to leap. Or external circumstances are pushing you toward fresh starts.
upright.hopes_fears: You hope for the freedom of new beginnings—and fear the vulnerability it requires. The open road both calls and terrifies. You want to leap but fear the fall.
upright.hidden_influences: A hidden factor is the opportunity to begin again. Something not yet visible offers a fresh start. Or unconscious naivety shapes the situation more than you realize.
upright.obstacles: The obstacle is taking the first step. Fear of beginning, of looking foolish, of not knowing enough—this blocks progress. The leap you're avoiding is the way forward.
upright.external_influences: Forces outside your control push toward new beginnings. Others may see you as ready to leap before you feel it. The world invites fresh starts.

reversed.todays_guidance: Today asks you to examine blocked beginnings. Are you frozen at the edge or leaping without looking? Notice which shadow is active—fear or recklessness.
reversed.past: The Fool's shadow shaped your path—recklessness that left bruises, or paralysis that let opportunities pass. Understanding this pattern illuminates your present.
reversed.present: Right now you're caught between recklessness and paralysis. Either leaping without wisdom or frozen when movement is required. Which shadow is active?
reversed.future: Ahead lies a blocked beginning or a reckless leap. The path forward requires healing your relationship with risk—finding the ground between frozen and foolish.
reversed.situation: The situation involves false starts or fear-based inaction. Something about beginning has gone sideways. Either too much caution or not enough.
reversed.action: Don't leap blindly, but don't stay frozen either. The action needed is examining why beginning feels impossible or why you're rushing without looking.
reversed.outcome: This leads to incomplete beginnings or consequences of recklessness. The result involves learning—possibly through failure—about how to start wisely.
reversed.challenge: A broken relationship with risk blocks you. Past burns made you either too cautious or too reckless. Healthy trust in yourself is what you're missing.
reversed.above: Your best hope involves healing blocked beginnings. The highest outcome requires moving past fear without falling into recklessness. Wise beginning, not paralysis or impulsiveness.
reversed.below: Beneath this situation lies fear of beginning—or unconscious recklessness. Hidden patterns around risk and trust shape everything. Past leaps or frozen moments echo here.
reversed.advice: Examine your relationship with beginning. Why are you stuck or rushing? The guidance is neither 'just leap' nor 'stay safe' but 'understand your pattern.'
reversed.external: Outside influences reflect blocked beginnings or recklessness. Someone in your environment fears change or acts without thinking. This mirrors something in you.
reversed.hopes_fears: You fear both the leap and the staying. Recklessness terrifies; paralysis terrifies. The hope is finding the middle ground you can't quite see.
reversed.hidden_influences: A hidden factor is fear disguised as wisdom, or recklessness disguised as courage. Something not visible involves false starts or frozen potential.
reversed.obstacles: The obstacle is your wounded relationship with risk. Either you can't start or you can't stop starting over. Past experiences with beginning block the way.
reversed.external_influences: External forces reflect blocked or reckless energy. Others may be urging action you're not ready for, or their caution reinforces your paralysis.

upright.todays_guidance: Today you have everything needed to manifest your intentions. Focus energy, take action, trust your skills. The tools are on the table—use them.
upright.past: You once channeled your will effectively. A time when skills, resources, and timing aligned. That manifestation, successful or not, taught you what's possible.
upright.present: Right now you possess all necessary elements. The channel between intention and reality is open. What you focus on, you can create. Act on this.
upright.future: Coming: a time when everything aligns for manifestation. Skills sharpen, resources appear, opportunity opens. Prepare to act with focused will.
upright.situation: The situation calls for directed will and skillful action. All elements are present—the question is how you'll channel them. This is about manifestation.
upright.action: Focus your intention and act with confidence. Use the skills you have. The action required is deliberate creation—channeling will into form.
upright.outcome: This leads to manifestation of intention. What you've focused on takes form. The outcome depends on what you've been channeling your energy toward.
upright.challenge: The challenge is focusing scattered energy. All elements exist but you're not bringing them together. Directed will is what's lacking.
upright.above: Your highest possibility is masterful manifestation. The best outcome involves channeling all your gifts toward a clear intention. Aim for skillful creation.
upright.below: Beneath this situation lies untapped power to create. Unconsciously you know you could manifest what you want—this potential shapes everything.
upright.advice: Channel your energy deliberately. You have the skills—focus them. The guidance is to recognize your power and use it consciously.
upright.external: Someone with Magician energy influences the situation—a skilled manifester, a catalyst. Or external circumstances provide all the tools you need.
upright.hopes_fears: You hope to manifest your will fully—and fear having the power to do so. Or fear that you lack what's needed when you actually don't.
upright.hidden_influences: A hidden factor is latent power to create. Something not visible involves untapped skill or resources waiting to be channeled.
upright.obstacles: The obstacle is scattered focus or unused tools. Everything needed exists but isn't being directed. The blockage is in the channeling, not the capacity.
upright.external_influences: External forces offer all the elements for manifestation. The world provides what's needed—the question is whether you'll use it.

reversed.todays_guidance: Today notice where energy scatters or power gets misused. Are you doubting real abilities or using skills to manipulate? Ground your intention.
reversed.past: You once scattered your power or used it poorly. Manipulation, self-deception, or wasted potential—this history shapes your current relationship with your abilities.
reversed.present: Right now energy scatters or power misdirects. Either doubting what you can do, or using skills in shadow ways. The tools exist but aren't serving well.
reversed.future: Ahead lies a need to address scattered energy or misused power. What's coming requires honest reckoning with how you channel your abilities.
reversed.situation: The situation involves scattered or misused power. Talents wasted, energy diffused, or skill serving manipulation. Something about manifestation has gone sideways.
reversed.action: Stop scattering energy or manipulating. The action needed is honest assessment of how you're using your power. Focus or come clean.
reversed.outcome: This leads to consequences of scattered focus or manipulation. The result shows what happens when power isn't channeled cleanly.
reversed.challenge: The challenge is your relationship with your own power—doubting it, scattering it, or using it to deceive. Honest self-assessment is needed.
reversed.above: Your best hope involves reclaiming and focusing your power honestly. The highest outcome requires addressing manipulation or self-doubt.
reversed.below: Beneath this situation lies fear of your own power or shadow uses of it. Unconscious manipulation or self-sabotage shapes what's visible.
reversed.advice: Examine how you use your gifts. Stop scattering or deceiving. The guidance is to get honest about your power—claim it cleanly or not at all.
reversed.external: Outside influences involve manipulation or wasted potential. Someone may be deceiving you, or external chaos scatters your focus.
reversed.hopes_fears: You fear your power—either having it or not having it. The shadow Magician in you worries about manipulation or inadequacy.
reversed.hidden_influences: A hidden factor is deception or untapped potential. Something not visible involves either manipulation at play or gifts you're not using.
reversed.obstacles: The obstacle is self-deception, manipulation, or scattered focus. The blockage isn't lacking power—it's how that power is being (mis)used.
reversed.external_influences: External forces scatter your energy or introduce deception. The world reflects your shadow relationship with power back to you.

upright.todays_guidance: Today trust intuition over logic. Listen to dreams, hunches, subtle knowing. Receptivity over action. The answers aren't in analysis—they're in stillness.
upright.past: You once knew something without knowing how. That intuition—trusted or ignored—shaped the path to here. The inner voice spoke; what did you do with it?
upright.present: Right now intuition offers guidance that logic can't. The conscious mind doesn't have these answers—the unconscious does. Listen inward.
upright.future: Coming: a time when inner wisdom becomes essential. Intuition will guide where analysis fails. Prepare to trust what you can't fully explain.
upright.situation: The situation holds hidden dimensions that only intuition can access. There's more beneath the surface than appears. Mystery is involved—honor it.
upright.action: Go inward, not outward. The action needed is listening, not doing. Sit with the question rather than forcing answers. Let knowing emerge.
upright.outcome: This leads to revelation of hidden truth. What was unconscious surfaces. The outcome involves finally knowing what you've sensed all along.
upright.challenge: The challenge is trusting what you can't prove. Intuition speaks but you struggle to follow it without rational justification. The veil blocks because you won't part it.
upright.above: Your highest possibility is deep intuitive wisdom. The best outcome involves trusting inner knowing completely. Aim for the priestess's certainty.
upright.below: Beneath this situation lies vast unconscious knowledge. You already know more than you realize. This hidden wisdom shapes everything above it.
upright.advice: Trust your intuition. The guidance is to honor inner knowing even when it can't be explained. Go still. Listen to what whispers.
upright.external: Someone with deep intuitive wisdom influences the situation. Or external circumstances require tuning into what's hidden rather than obvious.
upright.hopes_fears: You hope for clear inner knowing—and fear the mystery it requires. Trusting intuition means releasing control; that's both desired and frightening.
upright.hidden_influences: A hidden factor is intuitive truth waiting to be acknowledged. Something not visible involves the unconscious wisdom you're not yet accessing.
upright.obstacles: The obstacle is ignoring or overriding intuition. Inner wisdom speaks but gets dismissed for rational analysis. The mystery blocks because you won't enter it.
upright.external_influences: External forces call you toward inner wisdom. The world asks you to access what you know beneath the surface.

reversed.todays_guidance: Today notice where you're disconnected from intuition or where secrets cause harm. Are you ignoring inner wisdom or is something hidden that shouldn't be?
reversed.past: You once lost connection to intuition, or secrets caused damage. That disconnection from inner knowing shaped your path. Hidden things had power because they stayed hidden.
reversed.present: Right now intuition is blocked or secrets disrupt. Either you're too rational, dismissing gut feelings, or something concealed needs surfacing.
reversed.future: Ahead lies reckoning with blocked intuition or damaging secrets. What's coming requires either reconnecting to inner wisdom or revealing what's hidden.
reversed.situation: The situation involves disconnection from intuition or secrets causing harm. Something hidden distorts things, or inner wisdom goes unheard.
reversed.action: Either reconnect to intuition or bring secrets to light. The action needed addresses whatever is blocked or hidden. Stop ignoring what you know.
reversed.outcome: This leads to consequences of ignored intuition or revealed secrets. The result shows what happens when inner wisdom goes unheeded or when hidden things surface.
reversed.challenge: The challenge is blocked intuition or harmful secrets. Either you can't access inner knowing or something concealed creates the obstacle.
reversed.above: Your best hope involves reconnecting to intuition or clearing secrets. The highest outcome requires addressing what's blocked or hidden.
reversed.below: Beneath this situation lies repressed intuition or buried secrets. Unconscious disconnection from inner wisdom shapes everything visible.
reversed.advice: Address the disconnection. Reconnect to intuition or bring hidden things to light. The guidance is to stop ignoring what you know or hiding what should be known.
reversed.external: Outside influences involve blocked intuition or hidden information. Someone may be keeping secrets, or external noise drowns out inner wisdom.
reversed.hopes_fears: You fear losing connection to inner wisdom—and fear what might surface if you truly listen. The secrets and the knowing both frighten.
reversed.hidden_influences: A hidden factor is repressed intuition or secrets affecting the situation invisibly. Something not conscious plays a larger role than you realize.
reversed.obstacles: The obstacle is disconnection from inner knowing or something deliberately concealed. The blockage involves what you can't or won't access.
reversed.external_influences: External forces block intuitive access or involve secrets. The world reflects your disconnection from inner wisdom back to you.

upright.todays_guidance: Today something ends so something else can begin. Don't resist the transformation—release what's passing. The day asks for surrender to necessary change.
upright.past: A necessary ending shaped your journey. Something died—identity, relationship, belief, chapter—and that transformation brought you here. The old had to pass.
upright.present: You're mid-transformation now. Something actively ends while something else prepares to be born. This moment is the chrysalis, not the butterfly yet.
upright.future: Transformation approaches. What needs to end will end. The path ahead includes necessary death of something—prepare to release rather than grip.
upright.situation: The situation involves fundamental transformation. Something must end for something new to live. Metamorphosis, not mere change—deep restructuring.
upright.action: Let go. Release what's ending rather than fighting to preserve it. The action required is conscious surrender to transformation already underway.
upright.outcome: This leads to complete transformation. What exists now will not exist in the same form. The outcome is rebirth through necessary ending.
upright.challenge: The transformation itself is your obstacle. Resistance to necessary ending blocks progress. What you're gripping is what you need to release.
upright.above: Your highest possibility is complete transformation. The best outcome involves fully releasing the old so the new can emerge. Aim for total metamorphosis.
upright.below: Beneath this situation lies the truth that something must die. Unconsciously you know what needs ending—this hidden knowing shapes everything.
upright.advice: Surrender to the transformation. Stop bargaining with the inevitable. The guidance is to release gracefully rather than be dragged through.
upright.external: External forces demand transformation. Something or someone outside you insists on ending what's no longer viable. The environment won't let the old survive.
upright.hopes_fears: You hope transformation brings rebirth—and fear the death it requires. The ending is both what you need and what terrifies you.
upright.hidden_influences: A hidden factor is transformation already underway. Something not visible is ending or preparing to end. The metamorphosis has begun beneath the surface.
upright.obstacles: The obstacle is the ending you're resisting. What blocks you is your grip on what's already dying. Transformation stalls because you won't let go.
upright.external_influences: External forces insist on transformation. The world demands ending and rebirth, whether you feel ready or not.

reversed.todays_guidance: Today notice where transformation stalls. Something won't die, or you won't let it. The day asks for honest look at what you're keeping alive past its time.
reversed.past: A transformation that didn't complete shapes your present. Something should have ended but lingered. That incomplete death still haunts.
reversed.present: Right now transformation stalls. Something dying won't die, or you're blocking change that needs to happen. The chrysalis isn't dissolving.
reversed.future: Ahead lies stalled transformation or prolonged endings. What's coming involves finally completing what wouldn't finish, or continuing to stagnate.
reversed.situation: The situation involves blocked or incomplete transformation. Something should have ended but hasn't. Stagnation from resisted change.
reversed.action: Complete the ending or stop resisting it. The action needed addresses whatever transformation you've blocked. Let what's dying finally die.
reversed.outcome: This leads to consequences of blocked transformation. The result shows what happens when necessary endings don't complete—stagnation or forced eventual change.
reversed.challenge: The challenge is completing transformation you've resisted. What blocks you is the ending you keep postponing. The half-death prevents rebirth.
reversed.above: Your best hope involves finally completing the transformation. The highest outcome requires letting what should have ended finally end.
reversed.below: Beneath this situation lies fear of completing the transformation. Unconsciously you're holding onto what needs to die. This resistance shapes everything.
reversed.advice: Finish it. Let the ending complete. The guidance is to stop prolonging what should have already passed. The half-alive must become fully dead to become fully alive again.
reversed.external: Outside influences reflect stalled transformation. Someone or something in your environment models incomplete endings or blocks necessary change.
reversed.hopes_fears: You fear both the ending and the endless dying. You hope to avoid transformation—but also fear staying stuck in its incomplete form.
reversed.hidden_influences: A hidden factor is blocked transformation. Something not visible involves stalled change or resistance to necessary endings that shapes the situation.
reversed.obstacles: The obstacle is the transformation you won't complete. What blocks you is your refusal to let something finally die. Partial change stagnates.
reversed.external_influences: External forces reflect or reinforce blocked transformation. The world mirrors your resistance back to you, or actively prevents needed endings.

upright.todays_guidance: Today brings healing and hope. Trust that renewal is possible. Pour yourself out without fearing depletion—you'll be replenished. The day invites faith.
upright.past: Hope and healing shaped your journey. A time when renewal seemed possible, when faith was restored. That light, however brief, left its mark.
upright.present: Right now hope is available if you'll receive it. Healing energy surrounds this moment. Renewal and faith are present—not just coming, but here.
upright.future: Healing approaches. After darkness or upheaval, light returns. What's coming brings renewed faith, inspiration, authentic connection to meaning.
upright.situation: The situation holds hope and potential for healing. Renewal is possible here. Despite whatever darkness preceded, light exists in this.
upright.action: Pour yourself out in faith. Trust the process of healing. The action needed is vulnerable openness—giving without fearing depletion.
upright.outcome: This leads to renewal and restored faith. The outcome is healing—not just surviving the dark but finding light beyond it.
upright.challenge: The challenge is accepting hope. Healing is available but you struggle to believe in it. Cynicism or past wounds block renewal.
upright.above: Your highest possibility is complete renewal. The best outcome involves fully embracing hope and healing. Aim for the Star's serene faith.
upright.below: Beneath this situation lies deep need for hope and healing. Unconsciously you're seeking renewal—this hidden longing shapes everything.
upright.advice: Trust the light. Accept healing. The guidance is to believe in renewal even when it seems fragile. Pour yourself out and trust replenishment.
upright.external: Outside influences offer hope and healing. Someone or something in your environment carries the Star's energy—a source of renewal.
upright.hopes_fears: You hope for healing and renewed faith—and fear it won't come, or won't last. Hope itself feels vulnerable.
upright.hidden_influences: A hidden factor is healing already underway. Something not visible involves renewal working beneath the surface. Hope exists where you don't see it.
upright.obstacles: The obstacle is blocked hope. What blocks you is difficulty believing in healing or receiving it. The light is there; you're not looking at it.
upright.external_influences: External forces offer renewal and hope. The world provides healing if you'll accept it.

reversed.todays_guidance: Today notice where hope feels blocked. Despair, disconnection, or lost faith—name it honestly. The day asks where you've stopped believing in renewal.
reversed.past: Lost hope or blocked healing shaped your path. A time when faith collapsed or renewal felt impossible. That darkness left its mark.
reversed.present: Right now hope is hard to access. Despair, disconnection from meaning, or lost faith characterizes this moment. The light exists but you can't see it.
reversed.future: Ahead lies reckoning with lost hope. What's coming involves either finding faith again or sinking deeper into disconnection. The choice approaches.
reversed.situation: The situation involves blocked hope or lost faith. Healing available but not received. Despair or cynicism shapes the landscape.
reversed.action: Address the despair. Seek what's blocking hope. The action needed is honest acknowledgment of lost faith—not false positivity, but real reckoning.
reversed.outcome: This leads to consequences of blocked hope. The result shows what happens when healing is refused or faith collapses.
reversed.challenge: The challenge is lost hope blocking everything else. Despair or cynicism is the obstacle. What you've stopped believing in is what you need.
reversed.above: Your best hope is recovering hope. The highest outcome involves finding your way back to faith and healing. Aim for renewed belief.
reversed.below: Beneath this situation lies buried despair. Unconsciously, you've lost hope—this hidden loss of faith shapes everything visible.
reversed.advice: Acknowledge the despair, then look for light anyway. The guidance is neither denial nor wallowing—honest reckoning followed by renewed search for hope.
reversed.external: Outside influences reflect or reinforce lost hope. Someone or something in your environment models despair or blocks access to healing.
reversed.hopes_fears: You fear hope is lost forever—and fear finding it only to lose it again. Faith feels too dangerous to reach for.
reversed.hidden_influences: A hidden factor is despair affecting the situation. Something not visible involves lost faith or blocked healing shaping outcomes.
reversed.obstacles: The obstacle is despair itself. What blocks you is lost hope or inability to believe in renewal. The light exists; you've turned away from it.
reversed.external_influences: External forces reflect or reinforce disconnection from hope. The world mirrors your despair or actively blocks healing.

upright.todays_guidance: Today nurture and be nurtured. Create, grow, receive pleasure. The day invites abundance through allowing rather than forcing. Let things bloom.
upright.past: Abundance and nurturing shaped your path. A time of growth, creativity, fertility in some form. That generative energy brought you here.
upright.present: Right now creative abundance is available. Nurturing energy surrounds this moment. Growth happens through receiving and allowing, not pushing.
upright.future: Fertility and abundance approach. What's coming involves growth, creativity, pleasure. Prepare to receive and nurture what's given.
upright.situation: The situation calls for nurturing energy. Creative abundance is possible here. Growth through care, not force. The mother principle at work.
upright.action: Nurture what needs nurturing. Create, receive, allow growth. The action required is generative care—tending rather than forcing.
upright.outcome: This leads to abundance and creative fruition. What's been nurtured bears fruit. The outcome is growth realized.
upright.challenge: The challenge is receiving or nurturing. Creative blocks, depleted care, inability to allow abundance. Something about fertility or nurturing is stuck.
upright.above: Your highest possibility is abundant creativity. The best outcome involves full nurturing and growth. Aim for the Empress's generative overflow.
upright.below: Beneath this situation lies deep need to nurture or be nurtured. Unconscious creativity or mother-hunger shapes everything above.
upright.advice: Nurture. Create. Receive. The guidance is to allow abundance rather than chase it. Tend your garden; it will grow.
upright.external: Outside influences offer nurturing or creative energy. Someone embodies the Empress—abundant, generative, caring. Or circumstances invite growth.
upright.hopes_fears: You hope for abundance and creative fertility—and fear you can't receive or sustain it. Nurturing feels both needed and daunting.
upright.hidden_influences: A hidden factor is creative potential or nurturing need. Something not visible involves fertility, growth, or care shaping the situation.
upright.obstacles: The obstacle involves blocked nurturing or creativity. What blocks you is inability to receive, create, or care. The abundance is there; access is stuck.
upright.external_influences: External forces offer abundance and growth. The world provides nurturing energy if you'll receive it.

reversed.todays_guidance: Today notice where nurturing is blocked or excessive. Smothering, creative blocks, depleted care. The day asks what's wrong with growth and receiving.
reversed.past: Blocked creativity or wounded nurturing shaped your path. A time when growth stalled, care depleted, or love smothered. That wound echoes.
reversed.present: Right now nurturing energy is stuck. Either giving too much, receiving too little, or creativity blocked. The growth principle isn't flowing.
reversed.future: Ahead lies reckoning with blocked abundance. What's coming involves addressing creative blocks, depleted care, or smothering patterns.
reversed.situation: The situation involves wounded nurturing or blocked creativity. Something about growth, care, or receiving has gone wrong.
reversed.action: Address the blockage. Stop smothering or start nurturing. The action needed confronts whatever has stalled growth or depleted care.
reversed.outcome: This leads to consequences of blocked nurturing. The result shows what happens when creativity stalls or care wounds.
reversed.challenge: The challenge is wounded abundance. Creative blocks, depleted giving, smothering love. Something about the mother principle is the obstacle.
reversed.above: Your best hope involves healing nurturing wounds. The highest outcome requires addressing creative blocks or care patterns.
reversed.below: Beneath this situation lies wounded nurturing. Unconscious creative blocks or mother-wounds shape everything visible.
reversed.advice: Address what's blocked. Stop over-giving or start receiving. The guidance is to find healthy flow in nurturing—neither starved nor smothered.
reversed.external: Outside influences reflect blocked nurturing. Someone models creative blocks, depletion, or smothering. The environment stifles or starves growth.
reversed.hopes_fears: You fear creative depletion or smothering love. The wound around nurturing—too much or too little—frightens.
reversed.hidden_influences: A hidden factor is blocked creativity or nurturing wounds. Something not visible involves stalled growth or care patterns.
reversed.obstacles: The obstacle is wounded nurturing. What blocks you involves creative blocks, depleted care, or excessive control over growth.
reversed.external_influences: External forces reflect blocked abundance. The world mirrors creative stagnation or nurturing wounds back to you.

upright.todays_guidance: Today establish structure and take command. Build foundations, set boundaries, claim authority. The day calls for the father principle—protect and order.
upright.past: Structure and authority shaped your path. A time when foundations were built, order established, or a father figure influenced you. That stability brought you here.
upright.present: Right now structure is needed. Authority must be claimed or acknowledged. Boundaries require setting. This moment calls for order and command.
upright.future: Structure and stability approach. What's coming involves building foundations, taking authority, establishing order. Prepare to lead.
upright.situation: The situation calls for structure and authority. Order is needed here. The question is whether you'll establish it or submit to another's.
upright.action: Take command. Build structure. Set boundaries. The action required is assuming authority and creating order. Lead, don't follow.
upright.outcome: This leads to established structure. Foundations built, authority claimed, order created. The outcome is stability through discipline.
upright.challenge: The challenge is claiming or handling authority. Either you can't take command or you're facing someone else's. Structure is the issue.
upright.above: Your highest possibility is masterful authority. The best outcome involves building lasting foundations and leading well. Aim for the Emperor's stable command.
upright.below: Beneath this situation lies need for structure or father-energy. Unconscious patterns around authority shape everything above.
upright.advice: Take command. Build foundations. The guidance is to claim your authority and create the structure you need. Be the Emperor, not the subject.
upright.external: Outside influences involve authority or structure. A father figure, boss, or institution affects things. Or circumstances demand you take charge.
upright.hopes_fears: You hope for stable authority—and fear it (yours or others'). Power, control, and structure feel both needed and threatening.
upright.hidden_influences: A hidden factor involves authority or structure. Something not visible relates to father-energy, control, or foundations.
upright.obstacles: The obstacle involves authority. Either you can't claim yours, or another's blocks you. Structure is stuck or imposed.
upright.external_influences: External forces involve authority and structure. The world demands order or imposes someone else's control.

reversed.todays_guidance: Today notice where authority is abused or absent. Tyranny, rigidity, or lack of structure. The day asks what's wrong with power and control.
reversed.past: Wounded authority shaped your path. A time when power was abused, structure failed, or father-energy wounded you. That pattern echoes.
reversed.present: Right now authority is problematic. Either tyrannical, rigid, absent, or you can't claim yours. Structure is broken or excessive.
reversed.future: Ahead lies reckoning with wounded authority. What's coming involves confronting abuse of power, absent leadership, or structural failures.
reversed.situation: The situation involves broken authority. Power abused, structure too rigid or absent, leadership failing. Something about the father principle is wrong.
reversed.action: Address the authority wound. Confront tyranny or claim power you've avoided. The action needed fixes what's wrong with control and structure.
reversed.outcome: This leads to consequences of broken authority. The result shows what happens when power corrupts or structure fails.
reversed.challenge: The challenge is wounded power. Tyranny, rigidity, absent authority—something about control and structure is the obstacle.
reversed.above: Your best hope involves healing authority wounds. The highest outcome requires healthy relationship with power and structure.
reversed.below: Beneath this situation lies wounded authority. Unconscious father-wounds or control issues shape everything visible.
reversed.advice: Address the power wound. Neither tyrannize nor abdicate. The guidance is to find healthy authority—firm but not rigid, present but not dominating.
reversed.external: Outside influences reflect wounded authority. A tyrannical figure, absent leader, or broken institution affects the situation.
reversed.hopes_fears: You fear abuse of power—yours or others'. Authority feels dangerous, either its excess or its absence.
reversed.hidden_influences: A hidden factor is broken authority. Something not visible involves power abuse, absent leadership, or structural failure.
reversed.obstacles: The obstacle is wounded authority. What blocks you involves tyranny, rigidity, or inability to take necessary control.
reversed.external_influences: External forces reflect broken power. The world imposes tyranny or reflects absent authority back to you.

upright.todays_guidance: Today consider tradition and established paths. Seek teachers, honor institutions, follow proven methods. The day invites learning through structure.
upright.past: Tradition and teaching shaped your path. A time when established methods guided you, when you learned from those who came before. That foundation influences now.
upright.present: Right now tradition has something to offer. Established wisdom, formal learning, or proven paths are relevant. Consider what's been handed down.
upright.future: Teaching and tradition approach. What's coming involves learning, mentorship, or established institutions. Prepare to receive structured wisdom.
upright.situation: The situation calls for traditional approach. Established methods, proven paths, institutional wisdom. Conformity may serve here.
upright.action: Follow the tradition. Seek teaching. Use proven methods. The action required works within established structures rather than against them.
upright.outcome: This leads through traditional paths. The outcome involves institutional recognition, formal learning completed, or established methods succeeding.
upright.challenge: The challenge involves tradition. Either it constrains you or you're resisting what it offers. Conformity and institution are the issue.
upright.above: Your highest possibility is traditional wisdom mastered. The best outcome involves learning fully from what's been established. Aim for the Hierophant's deep knowledge.
upright.below: Beneath this situation lies relationship with tradition. Unconscious conformity or rebellion against it shapes everything above.
upright.advice: Honor what's been proven. Seek teaching. The guidance is to learn from tradition before transcending it. The old ways have value.
upright.external: Outside influences involve tradition or institution. A teacher, mentor, or formal structure affects things. Established paths are presented.
upright.hopes_fears: You hope for guidance and proven paths—and fear conformity's cost. Tradition feels both safe and constraining.
upright.hidden_influences: A hidden factor involves tradition. Something not visible relates to institutional influence, inherited beliefs, or conventional expectations.
upright.obstacles: The obstacle involves tradition. Either it blocks you or your resistance to it does. Conformity is stuck.
upright.external_influences: External forces involve tradition and institution. The world presents established paths and conventional expectations.

reversed.todays_guidance: Today question tradition. Challenge conventions, forge your own path, break from what's been handed down. The day invites spiritual independence.
reversed.past: Breaking from tradition shaped your path. A time when you rejected conventional paths, challenged institutions, or forged your own way. That independence influences now.
reversed.present: Right now tradition doesn't serve. Conventions need challenging, your own path needs forging. Established methods fail or constrain.
reversed.future: Independence from tradition approaches. What's coming involves breaking from convention, challenging institutions, or finding your own spiritual path.
reversed.situation: The situation calls for questioning tradition. Established methods fail here. Personal truth diverges from received wisdom.
reversed.action: Break from convention. Forge your own path. The action required questions what's been handed down and finds your own answer.
reversed.outcome: This leads away from traditional paths. The outcome involves breaking from institution, rejecting convention, or finding personal truth outside established channels.
reversed.challenge: The challenge is breaking from tradition. Either you can't leave convention behind or you've broken too far from grounding. Independence is the issue.
reversed.above: Your highest possibility is spiritual independence. The best outcome involves finding your own truth beyond received doctrine.
reversed.below: Beneath this situation lies rebellion against tradition. Unconscious rejection of convention or unexamined assumptions shapes everything.
reversed.advice: Question the tradition. Forge your own path. The guidance is to find your truth beyond what's been handed down. Conventions may not apply.
reversed.external: Outside influences challenge tradition. Someone models unconventionality or circumstances force breaking from established paths.
reversed.hopes_fears: You hope for freedom from convention—and fear losing the ground tradition provides. Independence and belonging both matter.
reversed.hidden_influences: A hidden factor involves rejected tradition. Something not visible relates to breaking from convention or unexamined assumptions.
reversed.obstacles: The obstacle involves tradition's shadow. Either convention constrains inappropriately or rootless independence destabilizes.
reversed.external_influences: External forces challenge tradition. The world invites breaking from convention or reflects your rebellion back to you.

upright.todays_guidance: Today involves meaningful choice or partnership. Align action with values. Union, harmony, and decisions that define you. Choose what you truly love.
upright.past: A meaningful choice or union shaped your path. A time when partnership mattered or a decision revealed your values. That choice brought you here.
upright.present: Right now meaningful choice or partnership is central. Values alignment matters. This moment asks what you truly love and whether you'll choose it.
upright.future: Union or significant choice approaches. What's coming involves partnership, values alignment, or decisions that reveal who you are.
upright.situation: The situation involves choice and values. Partnership may be relevant. What you choose here reveals what you truly love.
upright.action: Choose what aligns with your values. Honor the partnership. The action required makes the choice that reflects who you really are.
upright.outcome: This leads to union or values expressed. The outcome involves partnership realized or choice revealing your truth.
upright.challenge: The challenge is meaningful choice. Either you can't decide or the choice conflicts with your values. Partnership or values alignment is stuck.
upright.above: Your highest possibility is perfect union or values alignment. The best outcome involves love and choice harmonized. Aim for true partnership.
upright.below: Beneath this situation lies deep longing for union or values clarity. Unconscious desires around love and choice shape everything.
upright.advice: Choose what you love. Honor your values. The guidance is to align action with what truly matters. The right choice reflects who you are.
upright.external: Outside influences involve partnership or choice. A significant other or situation forces values clarification. Love enters the picture.
upright.hopes_fears: You hope for true love and values alignment—and fear choosing wrong or losing union. The choice feels momentous.
upright.hidden_influences: A hidden factor involves love or values. Something not visible relates to partnership, attraction, or choices reflecting identity.
upright.obstacles: The obstacle involves choice or union. Either you can't choose, values conflict, or partnership is blocked. Love is stuck.
upright.external_influences: External forces involve partnership and choice. The world presents options and relationships that clarify values.

reversed.todays_guidance: Today notice disharmony in values or relationship. Misalignment, difficult choices, inner conflict. The day asks where love or choice has fractured.
reversed.past: Disharmony or wrong choice shaped your path. A time when values conflicted, partnership broke, or you chose against your heart. That wound echoes.
reversed.present: Right now values or partnership are misaligned. Disharmony in relationship or inner conflict about choice. Something about union is fractured.
reversed.future: Ahead lies reckoning with misalignment. What's coming involves addressing values conflicts, relationship disharmony, or choices that went wrong.
reversed.situation: The situation involves broken harmony. Values conflict, partnership struggles, or choice has gone wrong. Something about love is fractured.
reversed.action: Address the disharmony. Realign values or relationship. The action needed fixes what's broken in love or choice.
reversed.outcome: This leads to consequences of misalignment. The result shows what happens when values conflict or love fractures.
reversed.challenge: The challenge is disharmony. Values conflict, partnership struggles, or inner division. Something about choice and love is the obstacle.
reversed.above: Your best hope involves realigning values or healing partnership. The highest outcome requires addressing what's fractured in love or choice.
reversed.below: Beneath this situation lies values conflict or love wound. Unconscious disharmony shapes everything visible.
reversed.advice: Address the misalignment. Heal the disharmony. The guidance is to realign with true values and address what's wrong in love.
reversed.external: Outside influences reflect disharmony. Relationship struggles or values conflicts in environment mirror inner division.
reversed.hopes_fears: You fear ongoing disharmony—values never aligning, love never working. The fracture feels permanent.
reversed.hidden_influences: A hidden factor is values conflict or love wound. Something not visible involves disharmony shaping the situation.
reversed.obstacles: The obstacle is misalignment. What blocks you involves values conflict, broken partnership, or inability to choose from heart.
reversed.external_influences: External forces reflect disharmony. The world presents relationship struggles or values conflicts.

upright.todays_guidance: Today move forward with will and determination. Harness opposing forces, take control, charge ahead. The day calls for victory through focused drive.
upright.past: Willpower and drive shaped your path. A time when you moved forward through sheer determination. That victory or that charge brought you here.
upright.present: Right now forward movement is possible through will. Opposing forces can be harnessed. Victory is available if you take the reins.
upright.future: Victory and forward movement approach. What's coming requires willpower and focused drive. Prepare to charge ahead.
upright.situation: The situation calls for determined action. Forward movement through will. Opposing forces need harnessing. Victory is possible through drive.
upright.action: Charge forward. Take the reins. The action required is willful movement—don't hesitate, don't second-guess. Move with determination.
upright.outcome: This leads to victory through will. Forward movement achieved. The outcome is what happens when you refuse to be stopped.
upright.challenge: The challenge is moving forward. Something blocks your drive or scatters your will. Victory requires focus you're struggling to achieve.
upright.above: Your highest possibility is triumphant forward movement. The best outcome involves complete victory through focused will. Aim for the Chariot's unstoppable drive.
upright.below: Beneath this situation lies drive and will. Unconscious ambition or need for control shapes everything above.
upright.advice: Take control and move. The guidance is to harness all forces toward your goal. Victory comes through will, not waiting.
upright.external: Outside influences offer momentum or challenge requiring drive. Circumstances demand forward movement. The race is on.
upright.hopes_fears: You hope for victory and forward movement—and fear losing control or being stopped. Momentum feels both exciting and precarious.
upright.hidden_influences: A hidden factor involves willpower or momentum. Something not visible relates to drive, control, or forward movement.
upright.obstacles: The obstacle blocks forward momentum. What stops you requires greater will or better harnessing of forces. The charge is stuck.
upright.external_influences: External forces demand forward movement. The world requires willpower and drive. Victory is available for those who move.

reversed.todays_guidance: Today notice scattered will or blocked movement. Lack of direction, aggression without purpose, forces pulling apart. Where has momentum stalled?
reversed.past: Scattered will or blocked movement shaped your path. A time when drive went nowhere, aggression misfired, or you couldn't move forward. That stalling echoes.
reversed.present: Right now momentum is blocked. Will scatters, direction unclear, forces won't align. Forward movement is stuck.
reversed.future: Ahead lies reckoning with blocked momentum. What's coming involves addressing scattered will or regaining direction.
reversed.situation: The situation involves blocked forward movement. Will scatters, direction lost, forces pull apart. Something about drive has stalled.
reversed.action: Address the stalling. Find direction or stop forcing. The action needed examines why momentum is blocked.
reversed.outcome: This leads to consequences of scattered will. The result shows what happens when drive has no direction or force without purpose.
reversed.challenge: The challenge is blocked momentum. Scattered will, lost direction, or forces that won't align. Forward movement is the obstacle.
reversed.above: Your best hope involves regaining direction. The highest outcome requires focusing scattered will or releasing forced control.
reversed.below: Beneath this situation lies scattered drive. Unconscious conflicts about direction or control shape everything visible.
reversed.advice: Address the stalling. Find direction or release force. The guidance is to examine what's blocking momentum before pushing harder.
reversed.external: Outside influences reflect blocked momentum. Chaos scatters your focus or obstacles stop your charge.
reversed.hopes_fears: You fear permanent stalling—momentum never returning, will forever scattered. Being stopped feels like failure.
reversed.hidden_influences: A hidden factor is blocked direction or scattered will. Something not visible stalls momentum.
reversed.obstacles: The obstacle is the stalling itself. What blocks you is scattered will, lost direction, or forces that won't align.
reversed.external_influences: External forces block or scatter momentum. The world presents obstacles or reflects your lost direction.

upright.todays_guidance: Today use gentle power over force. Patience, compassion, quiet courage. The day calls for inner strength—mastering instinct through love, not domination.
upright.past: Gentle strength shaped your path. A time when patience and compassion achieved what force couldn't. That soft power brought you here.
upright.present: Right now gentle strength is needed. Patience over force, compassion over control. Inner courage available if you access it.
upright.future: Gentle mastery approaches. What's coming requires patience, compassion, and inner strength. Prepare to tame rather than dominate.
upright.situation: The situation calls for soft power. Force won't work here. Patience, compassion, and gentle courage are what's needed.
upright.action: Use gentle strength. Tame through love, not force. The action required is patience and compassion, not domination.
upright.outcome: This leads to gentle victory. What couldn't be forced is tamed through love. The outcome is mastery through patience.
upright.challenge: The challenge is accessing inner strength. Force tempts but won't work. Patience and compassion are what you're struggling to sustain.
upright.above: Your highest possibility is gentle mastery. The best outcome involves complete patience and compassionate power. Aim for Strength's quiet courage.
upright.below: Beneath this situation lies inner fortitude. Unconscious courage or the lion within shapes everything above.
upright.advice: Be gentle and strong. The guidance is to use patience and compassion. The lion is tamed through love, not chains.
upright.external: Outside influences call for gentle power. Someone embodies patient strength or circumstances require soft courage.
upright.hopes_fears: You hope for inner courage and gentle mastery—and fear you lack the patience or that softness means weakness.
upright.hidden_influences: A hidden factor involves inner strength. Something not visible relates to courage, patience, or the taming of instinct.
upright.obstacles: The obstacle requires gentle strength. What blocks you can't be forced. Patience and compassion are what's needed.
upright.external_influences: External forces call for soft power. The world requires patience and inner courage.

reversed.todays_guidance: Today notice where strength fails. Self-doubt, raw emotion overpowering reason, or force misused. Where has gentle power collapsed?
reversed.past: Failed strength shaped your path. A time when patience broke, force was misused, or inner courage collapsed. That weakness echoes.
reversed.present: Right now inner strength is struggling. Self-doubt, overwhelming emotion, or misused power. Gentle mastery is failing.
reversed.future: Ahead lies reckoning with failed strength. What's coming requires addressing self-doubt or restoring gentle power.
reversed.situation: The situation involves collapsed strength. Self-doubt, overwhelming instinct, or force where patience was needed. Something about courage has failed.
reversed.action: Address the weakness. Restore patience or release force. The action needed rebuilds inner strength or stops misusing power.
reversed.outcome: This leads to consequences of failed strength. The result shows what happens when patience breaks or courage collapses.
reversed.challenge: The challenge is failed inner strength. Self-doubt, overwhelming emotion, or force without love. Gentle power is the obstacle.
reversed.above: Your best hope involves restoring inner strength. The highest outcome requires rebuilding patience, compassion, and quiet courage.
reversed.below: Beneath this situation lies self-doubt or overwhelm. Unconscious weakness or the untamed lion shapes everything.
reversed.advice: Address the weakness. Rebuild patience, restore faith in yourself. The guidance is to find gentle power again—neither collapsed nor forcing.
reversed.external: Outside influences reflect failed strength. Someone models weakness or force, or circumstances overwhelm patience.
reversed.hopes_fears: You fear ongoing weakness—courage never returning, always overwhelmed. The inner lion feels untamable.
reversed.hidden_influences: A hidden factor is collapsed strength. Something not visible involves self-doubt or overwhelm shaping outcomes.
reversed.obstacles: The obstacle is failed inner strength. What blocks you is self-doubt, overwhelming emotion, or misused force.
reversed.external_influences: External forces reflect or test inner strength. The world presents challenges that overwhelm gentle power.

upright.todays_guidance: Today go inward. Solitude, reflection, soul-searching. The day calls for withdrawal to find inner truth. Seek wisdom in silence.
upright.past: Solitude and reflection shaped your path. A time of withdrawal, inner searching, or guidance from within. That wisdom-seeking brought you here.
upright.present: Right now solitude is needed. Withdrawal for reflection, inner guidance sought. This moment calls for going inward.
upright.future: Solitude and wisdom approach. What's coming requires withdrawal, reflection, or seeking inner guidance. Prepare to go within.
upright.situation: The situation calls for solitude. Reflection, inner guidance, withdrawal from noise. Wisdom is found in stillness here.
upright.action: Withdraw and reflect. Go inward. The action required is solitude for wisdom—stepping back from the world to hear inner truth.
upright.outcome: This leads to wisdom through solitude. What was sought in stillness is found. The outcome is inner truth revealed.
upright.challenge: The challenge is going inward. Solitude feels difficult or you're avoiding reflection. Inner wisdom is blocked.
upright.above: Your highest possibility is deep inner wisdom. The best outcome involves full solitary reflection revealing truth. Aim for the Hermit's illumination.
upright.below: Beneath this situation lies need for solitude. Unconscious longing for withdrawal or inner guidance shapes everything.
upright.advice: Go within. Seek solitude. The guidance is to withdraw and reflect. The answer is found in silence, not noise.
upright.external: Outside influences support withdrawal. A wise guide appears, or circumstances demand solitary reflection.
upright.hopes_fears: You hope for inner wisdom—and fear the solitude it requires. Going within feels both necessary and lonely.
upright.hidden_influences: A hidden factor involves inner wisdom. Something not visible relates to solitary truth or guidance from within.
upright.obstacles: The obstacle blocks solitude. What prevents you from going inward must be addressed. Reflection is needed but not happening.
upright.external_influences: External forces call for withdrawal. The world supports solitude and inner seeking.

reversed.todays_guidance: Today notice isolation or avoiding reflection. Loneliness, withdrawal gone wrong, or refusing the inner journey. Where has solitude become exile?
reversed.past: Isolation or avoided reflection shaped your path. A time when solitude became loneliness or inner wisdom was refused. That avoidance echoes.
reversed.present: Right now solitude has gone wrong. Either isolation has become exile or you're refusing needed reflection. Inner wisdom is blocked.
reversed.future: Ahead lies reckoning with isolation or avoided wisdom. What's coming involves addressing loneliness or re-engaging after too much withdrawal.
reversed.situation: The situation involves problematic solitude. Either too much isolation or too little reflection. Something about going within has gone wrong.
reversed.action: Address the isolation. Either re-engage or finally do the reflection you've avoided. The action needed fixes solitude's shadow.
reversed.outcome: This leads to consequences of isolation or avoided wisdom. The result shows what happens when solitude becomes exile or reflection is refused.
reversed.challenge: The challenge is solitude's shadow. Loneliness, avoidance of reflection, or withdrawal that's lasted too long. Going within is stuck.
reversed.above: Your best hope involves healing isolation. The highest outcome requires either re-engaging or finally facing the inner work avoided.
reversed.below: Beneath this situation lies isolation or avoidance. Unconscious loneliness or refusal to reflect shapes everything visible.
reversed.advice: Address the shadow. Either emerge from isolation or start the reflection you've avoided. The guidance is to find healthy solitude—neither exile nor avoidance.
reversed.external: Outside influences reflect isolation. Loneliness in environment or pressure to finally face inner work.
reversed.hopes_fears: You fear permanent isolation—exile rather than solitude. Or you fear the reflection that solitude would require.
reversed.hidden_influences: A hidden factor is loneliness or avoidance. Something not visible involves isolation shaping outcomes or reflection refused.
reversed.obstacles: The obstacle is solitude's shadow. What blocks you is isolation gone too far or inner work you won't do.
reversed.external_influences: External forces reflect isolation. The world mirrors your loneliness or avoidance back to you.

upright.todays_guidance: Today the wheel turns. Change is coming—up or down, in or out. Accept the cycle. What rises will fall; what falls will rise. Trust the turning.
upright.past: A turning point shaped your path. The wheel moved—luck changed, circumstances shifted. That turning brought you here.
upright.present: Right now change is happening. The wheel turns. This moment is a turning point—circumstances shifting, fate in motion.
upright.future: Change approaches. The wheel will turn. What's coming involves shifting circumstances, luck changing, the cycle moving.
upright.situation: The situation involves the turning wheel. Things are changing—destiny, karma, luck in motion. Nothing stays fixed.
upright.action: Accept the turn. Move with the wheel. The action required is flexibility with fate—not fighting the cycle but riding it.
upright.outcome: This leads to changed circumstances. The wheel turns and where you land depends on the larger cycle. The outcome is motion.
upright.challenge: The challenge is the wheel itself. Change you didn't choose, luck shifting. Fate is the obstacle—and the opportunity.
upright.above: Your highest possibility is favorable turning. The best outcome involves the wheel moving in your direction. Aim to ride the upswing.
upright.below: Beneath this situation lies fate and karma. Unconscious patterns in the larger cycle shape everything above.
upright.advice: Accept the turn. The guidance is to move with the wheel rather than against it. Trust that what turns down will turn up again.
upright.external: Outside influences involve fate and change. Luck shifts, circumstances beyond control move. The wheel turns externally.
upright.hopes_fears: You hope the wheel turns favorably—and fear it won't. Change feels both exciting and uncontrollable.
upright.hidden_influences: A hidden factor is fate. Something not visible involves the larger cycle, karma, or luck shaping outcomes.
upright.obstacles: The obstacle is the wheel's position. What blocks you is where you are in the cycle. Trust it will turn.
upright.external_influences: External forces involve fate and cycles. The world turns regardless of your preferences.

reversed.todays_guidance: Today notice where you're stuck in the cycle or fighting change. Resistance to fate, bad luck, the wheel jammed. Where has change stalled?
reversed.past: Resistance to change or bad luck shaped your path. A time when the wheel seemed stuck or fortune was down. That struggle echoes.
reversed.present: Right now the wheel is stuck or you're fighting it. Resisting inevitable change, experiencing downturn, or feeling trapped in the cycle.
reversed.future: Ahead lies reckoning with blocked change. What's coming involves either the wheel finally moving or continued stagnation.
reversed.situation: The situation involves stuck fate. The wheel jammed, resistance to change, or downturn in progress. Something about the cycle is blocked.
reversed.action: Stop fighting the wheel. Address resistance to change. The action needed is releasing the jam, not forcing the turn.
reversed.outcome: This leads to consequences of stuck change. The result shows what happens when the cycle is resisted or fortune stays down.
reversed.challenge: The challenge is blocked change or downturn. The wheel is stuck or you're fighting it. Fate is the obstacle.
reversed.above: Your best hope involves the wheel moving again. The highest outcome requires releasing resistance or waiting for the turn.
reversed.below: Beneath this situation lies resistance to change. Unconscious fighting with fate shapes everything visible.
reversed.advice: Stop resisting. The guidance is to release the fight with fate. The wheel will turn when you stop jamming it.
reversed.external: Outside influences reflect stuck change. Bad luck or circumstances blocking the natural cycle.
reversed.hopes_fears: You fear the wheel will never turn—stuck forever in downturn. Change feels impossible.
reversed.hidden_influences: A hidden factor is blocked fate. Something not visible involves resistance to change or karma stalled.
reversed.obstacles: The obstacle is the stuck wheel. What blocks you is resistance to change or downturn that won't lift.
reversed.external_influences: External forces block or slow the cycle. The world reflects stuck change or downturn.

upright.todays_guidance: Today act with integrity. Truth, fairness, and cause-effect are in play. The day calls for honest accountability and balanced judgment.
upright.past: Justice shaped your path. A time when truth mattered, karma balanced, or you faced consequences—fair or not. That reckoning brought you here.
upright.present: Right now truth and fairness are central. Cause and effect operate. This moment asks for integrity and honest accounting.
upright.future: Justice approaches. What's coming involves truth revealed, karma balancing, or consequences arriving. Prepare for fair reckoning.
upright.situation: The situation involves truth and balance. Fairness matters here. Consequences connect to causes. Justice is at work.
upright.action: Act with integrity. Tell the truth. Accept responsibility. The action required is honest, fair, and accountable.
upright.outcome: This leads to just outcomes. Truth revealed, karma balanced, fairness restored. The outcome reflects what was put in.
upright.challenge: The challenge is fairness or truth. Either you face unjust circumstances or must confront your own accountability. Balance is the issue.
upright.above: Your highest possibility is true justice. The best outcome involves complete fairness and truth. Aim for balanced reckoning.
upright.below: Beneath this situation lies karma and cause-effect. Unconscious patterns of action and consequence shape everything.
upright.advice: Be fair. Be honest. The guidance is to act with integrity and accept just consequences. Truth serves even when it's hard.
upright.external: Outside influences involve justice. Legal matters, authority figures, or karmic circumstances. Fairness is externally demanded.
upright.hopes_fears: You hope for fair treatment—and fear judgment or consequences. Justice feels both desired and threatening.
upright.hidden_influences: A hidden factor involves truth or karma. Something not visible relates to causes and consequences operating.
upright.obstacles: The obstacle involves injustice or accountability. Either unfairness blocks you or your own integrity is the issue.
upright.external_influences: External forces involve fairness and truth. The world presents consequences and demands integrity.

reversed.todays_guidance: Today notice unfairness or avoided accountability. Dishonesty, injustice, or consequences dodged. Where is truth being evaded?
reversed.past: Injustice or dishonesty shaped your path. A time when fairness failed, accountability was avoided, or truth was hidden. That imbalance echoes.
reversed.present: Right now justice is failing. Unfairness operates, truth is hidden, or accountability is being dodged. Balance is off.
reversed.future: Ahead lies reckoning with injustice. What's coming involves either facing avoided consequences or addressing unfair treatment.
reversed.situation: The situation involves broken justice. Unfairness, dishonesty, or dodged accountability. Something about truth and balance is wrong.
reversed.action: Address the imbalance. Face accountability or fight injustice. The action needed restores truth and fairness.
reversed.outcome: This leads to consequences of injustice. The result shows what happens when truth is hidden or fairness fails.
reversed.challenge: The challenge is broken justice. Unfairness, dishonesty, or avoided accountability. Balance is the obstacle.
reversed.above: Your best hope involves restoring fairness. The highest outcome requires truth told and accountability accepted.
reversed.below: Beneath this situation lies hidden dishonesty or avoided consequences. Unconscious injustice shapes everything visible.
reversed.advice: Face the truth. Restore the balance. The guidance is to address unfairness or accept accountability you've avoided.
reversed.external: Outside influences involve injustice. Unfair treatment, corrupt systems, or consequences wrongly avoided.
reversed.hopes_fears: You fear ongoing injustice—fairness never restored, truth never told. Or you fear consequences finally arriving.
reversed.hidden_influences: A hidden factor is dishonesty or dodged consequences. Something not visible involves broken justice shaping outcomes.
reversed.obstacles: The obstacle is injustice. What blocks you involves unfairness, dishonesty, or avoided accountability.
reversed.external_influences: External forces involve broken fairness. The world presents injustice or demands you face what you've avoided.

upright.todays_guidance: Today surrender to gain wisdom. Pause, let go, see differently. The day calls for voluntary suspension—sacrifice of position for perspective.
upright.past: Surrender shaped your path. A time when you paused, let go, or saw from a new angle. That willing suspension brought insight.
upright.present: Right now pause is needed. Surrender, see differently, let go of control. This moment calls for the Hanged Man's willing suspension.
upright.future: Surrender approaches. What's coming requires letting go, pausing, or gaining new perspective. Prepare to hang willingly.
upright.situation: The situation calls for surrender. Pause, release control, see from a new angle. What looks like stalling is actually incubation.
upright.action: Surrender. Pause. Let go. The action required is willing suspension—stopping to see differently rather than pushing forward.
upright.outcome: This leads to wisdom through surrender. What was sacrificed in position is gained in perspective. The outcome is seeing differently.
upright.challenge: The challenge is letting go. You can't or won't surrender. Control, forward movement, or position feels impossible to release.
upright.above: Your highest possibility is wisdom through surrender. The best outcome involves complete letting go for new perspective. Aim for the Hanged Man's illumination.
upright.below: Beneath this situation lies need to let go. Unconscious resistance to surrender shapes everything above.
upright.advice: Surrender. Pause. The guidance is to stop fighting and let yourself hang. The perspective gained is worth the position sacrificed.
upright.external: Outside influences demand pause. Circumstances force stopping, or someone models willing surrender.
upright.hopes_fears: You hope surrender brings wisdom—and fear what you must release to get it. Letting go feels both necessary and terrifying.
upright.hidden_influences: A hidden factor is the need to surrender. Something not visible involves letting go or pausing to gain perspective.
upright.obstacles: The obstacle is resistance to surrender. What blocks you is unwillingness to pause, let go, or sacrifice position.
upright.external_influences: External forces demand pause. The world requires surrender and offers perspective in exchange.

reversed.todays_guidance: Today notice stalling or pointless sacrifice. Stuck in pause, martyrdom without wisdom, or refusing necessary surrender. Where has suspension become stuck?
reversed.past: Stalling or useless sacrifice shaped your path. A time when pause went too long or surrender was resisted. That stuck suspension echoes.
reversed.present: Right now pause has become stalling. Either refusing to surrender or stuck in pointless martyrdom. The suspension has lost its purpose.
reversed.future: Ahead lies reckoning with stuck pause. What's coming involves either finally surrendering or emerging from stalled suspension.
reversed.situation: The situation involves stuck pause. Stalling without wisdom, martyrdom without purpose, or refused surrender. Something about letting go has failed.
reversed.action: Unstick the pause. Either finally surrender or emerge from useless stalling. The action needed addresses what's stuck.
reversed.outcome: This leads to consequences of stuck surrender. The result shows what happens when pause becomes stalling or martyrdom loses meaning.
reversed.challenge: The challenge is stuck suspension. Either you won't let go or you've been hanging too long. Pause has become problem.
reversed.above: Your best hope involves unsticking the pause. The highest outcome requires either surrendering or emerging.
reversed.below: Beneath this situation lies fear of surrender or attachment to martyrdom. Unconscious stalling shapes everything visible.
reversed.advice: Unstick. Either surrender finally or emerge from pointless pause. The guidance is to find the purpose that's been lost.
reversed.external: Outside influences reflect stuck pause. Stalling circumstances or pressure to finally move or finally surrender.
reversed.hopes_fears: You fear permanent suspension—stuck forever in pause. Or you fear what happens when you finally emerge.
reversed.hidden_influences: A hidden factor is stuck surrender. Something not visible involves stalling or pointless martyrdom.
reversed.obstacles: The obstacle is the stuck pause itself. What blocks you is suspension that's lost its purpose.
reversed.external_influences: External forces reflect stalled surrender. The world shows you stuck pause or demands you finally move.

upright.todays_guidance: Today seek balance and patient integration. Moderation, blending opposites, the middle path. The day calls for gentle alchemy rather than force.
upright.past: Balance and patience shaped your path. A time of integration, healing, or finding the middle way. That moderation brought you here.
upright.present: Right now balance is needed. Patient blending, moderation, integration of opposites. This moment calls for Temperance's gentle alchemy.
upright.future: Balance and healing approach. What's coming requires patience, moderation, and integration. Prepare for gentle blending.
upright.situation: The situation calls for balance. Moderation, patience, blending what seems opposed. Healing through integration is possible here.
upright.action: Seek balance. Blend patiently. The action required is moderation and gentle integration rather than extremes or force.
upright.outcome: This leads to integration and balance. What seemed opposed is blended. The outcome is healing through patient moderation.
upright.challenge: The challenge is finding balance. Moderation feels impossible, patience runs out, or opposites won't blend. Integration is stuck.
upright.above: Your highest possibility is complete integration. The best outcome involves perfect balance and patient blending. Aim for Temperance's harmony.
upright.below: Beneath this situation lies need for balance. Unconscious extremes or impatience shapes everything above.
upright.advice: Blend patiently. Seek the middle. The guidance is moderation and gentle integration. What seems opposed can be combined.
upright.external: Outside influences support balance. Someone models patience or circumstances call for moderation.
upright.hopes_fears: You hope for harmony and healing—and fear the patience it requires. Balance feels both needed and slow.
upright.hidden_influences: A hidden factor is need for integration. Something not visible involves balance or the blending of opposites.
upright.obstacles: The obstacle is imbalance. What blocks you involves extremes, impatience, or inability to integrate.
upright.external_influences: External forces call for balance. The world requires moderation and offers integration.

reversed.todays_guidance: Today notice imbalance and impatience. Extremes, failed integration, rushing when slowness is needed. Where has moderation failed?
reversed.past: Imbalance or impatience shaped your path. A time when moderation failed, extremes dominated, or integration wouldn't happen. That discord echoes.
reversed.present: Right now balance is failing. Extremes dominate, patience breaks, or what should blend won't. Integration is stuck.
reversed.future: Ahead lies reckoning with imbalance. What's coming involves either finding moderation or facing consequences of extremes.
reversed.situation: The situation involves broken balance. Impatience, extremes, or failed integration. Something about moderation has failed.
reversed.action: Address the imbalance. Find patience or release extremes. The action needed restores moderation.
reversed.outcome: This leads to consequences of imbalance. The result shows what happens when moderation fails or extremes dominate.
reversed.challenge: The challenge is broken balance. Impatience, extremes, or failed integration. Moderation is the obstacle.
reversed.above: Your best hope involves restoring balance. The highest outcome requires finding patience and moderation again.
reversed.below: Beneath this situation lies hidden imbalance. Unconscious extremes or impatience shapes everything visible.
reversed.advice: Find the balance you've lost. Slow down, seek the middle. The guidance is to address extremes and restore patience.
reversed.external: Outside influences reflect imbalance. Extreme circumstances or pressure that breaks patience.
reversed.hopes_fears: You fear ongoing imbalance—never finding moderation, always in extremes. Harmony feels impossible.
reversed.hidden_influences: A hidden factor is extremes or impatience. Something not visible involves broken balance shaping outcomes.
reversed.obstacles: The obstacle is imbalance. What blocks you involves extremes, impatience, or failed integration.
reversed.external_influences: External forces reflect or create imbalance. The world presents extremes or tests your moderation.

upright.todays_guidance: Today examine what binds you. Attachments, shadow patterns, chains chosen. The day asks what controls you and whether you see the bars.
upright.past: Bondage or shadow shaped your path. A time when attachments controlled, the shadow ruled, or chains were accepted. That binding brought you here.
upright.present: Right now something binds you. Attachments, shadow patterns, chosen chains. This moment asks you to see what controls you.
upright.future: Shadow work or bondage approaches. What's coming involves facing attachments, confronting shadow, or recognizing chains. Prepare to see clearly.
upright.situation: The situation involves bondage. Attachments, shadow patterns, something that controls. The question is whether you see the chains.
upright.action: Examine what binds. Face the shadow. The action required is seeing clearly what controls you—the first step to freedom.
upright.outcome: This leads to confrontation with bondage. What binds becomes visible. The outcome involves either continued captivity or beginning of freedom.
upright.challenge: The challenge is the shadow or the chains. Attachment, addiction, or patterns that control. What binds you is the obstacle.
upright.above: Your highest possibility is freedom through awareness. The best outcome involves seeing and releasing what binds. Aim for liberation.
upright.below: Beneath this situation lies shadow material. Unconscious attachments, addictions, or fears that control. Bondage operates invisibly.
upright.advice: See the chains. Face the shadow. The guidance is to recognize what binds you—you can't release what you won't acknowledge.
upright.external: Outside influences involve bondage. Situations or people that bind, or external circumstances revealing your attachments.
upright.hopes_fears: You hope to break free—and fear what you'll find when you face the shadow. Liberation and the chains both frighten.
upright.hidden_influences: A hidden factor is unconscious bondage. Something not visible involves attachments, shadow, or control.
upright.obstacles: The obstacle is what binds you. Attachments, shadow patterns, or chosen chains that you won't or can't release.
upright.external_influences: External forces involve bondage. The world presents or reflects what controls you.

reversed.todays_guidance: Today notice freedom emerging or bondage resisted. Breaking chains, facing shadow, beginning liberation. Or deeper denial of what binds.
